text: @jeremycorbyn You could have made that a reality fella if you just had some balls & ruthlessness in you. During & after COVID-19 politics & economic policy won't change. Start a new party, you have a big enough following to make thing happen. 4 yrs is plenty of time to get ready for next GE.
